com.wrongsisters
Class AirRides

java.lang.Object
  com.wrongsisters.AirRides

public class AirRides
extends java.lang.Object

This class validates frequent flier numbers and makes air reservations.

Method Detail

validateFrequentFlierNumber

public static boolean validateFrequentFlierNumber(java.lang.String ffNumber)
Validates the frequent flier number. Valid frequent flier numbers contain only digits, and the first 4 digits must sum to 32.

Parameters:
ffNumber - frequent flier number.
Returns:
validation result.

reserve

public static int reserve(java.lang.String departureCode,
                          java.lang.String arrivalCode)
Makes an air reservation for the given airport codes. Checks the departure and arrival airport codes against a set of airport data.

Parameters:
departureCode - the departure airport code.
arrivalCode - the arrival airport code.
Returns:
the reservation acceptance code - 0 for rejected, 1 for accepted.
